game_description: Brite Light is a Zen game from the makers of Zen Monkeys. Clear your mind, breath and relax with Brite Light. Evoke nostalgia and create wonderful works of art with Bright Light. Fun for creative folks and people just looking to chill. Brite Light is a fun, zen-like creativity room. Brite Light includes: - A giant 4ft by 4ft Brite Lite Board; - Unlimited Pegs To Create With; -3 Free Brite Light Patterns; -An Auto-Save Feature So You Can Build Your Creation Over Time; -An Interactive Room That Includes Interactable Objects. Brite Light is the perfect Zen-Like experience for relaxing after a long day or clearing your head and letting your mind wonder safely in a fun, relaxing environment.
review_1: I remember waking up on Christmas morning and seeing several boxes but the first one I opened was a lite Brite. I used it everyday to make complex designs like I was an artist, but I also used to lay my head on it for a couple of minutes so it would seem as 9f I was sick so I would stay home from school.overall great game
review_2: I loved this as a kid and to play it now, is awesome. Really fun and creative.
review_3: NO MESS OR MISSING PIECES! Underrated. Good way to do some structured but free lance art.
